summary:
### Summary of Material Information:  
**Results of General Meeting – Cassius Mining Limited (11 July 2025)**  
- **All resolutions (1–9) passed**, including:  
  - **Ratification of prior placements** (Resolutions 1–2) – Approved with >98% support.  
  - **Placement shares issued to directors** (Resolutions 3–4) – Approved with >99.9% support.  
  - **Shares issued in lieu of directors’ fees** (Resolutions 5–7) – Approved with >99.9% support.  
  - **Convertible note issuance to David Chidlow** (Resolution 8) – Approved (99.97%).  
  - **Additional 10% placement capacity** (Resolution 9, Special) – Approved (99.09%).  

**Impact**: Significant shareholder approval for capital structure changes, including director-related securities issuance and increased placement flexibility. No pricing or volume specifics disclosed.
